Spider

Class WebSpider

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spider.WebSpider

  • public class WebSpider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for collecting information from pages linked in the initial URL.

      • spiderRun

        public boolean spiderRun()
        Get the html page line by line and get useful information, for instance keywords, or hyperlinks.
        Returns:
        true - if the process success, false - process failed

      • spiderReport

        private void spiderReport()
        Print the result of current spider into the result file, later use by the SearchEngine. And print the report on console window.

      • extractHyperlinks

      • formatURL

        private java.lang.String formatURL(java.lang.String url)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the formatted url

        Check if the url is processed.
        Parameters:

        url - - the target url
        Returns:
